TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CategoryNameCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of category name strings.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This collection is used to store collections of toolbox category names.
## Examples The following code example attempts to retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService> when the control is sited in design mode. If the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService> is retrieved, the code gets the names of each toolbox category and draws each name on the surface of the control.
[!code-cpp[CategoryNameCollectionExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.drawing.design._14_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[CategoryNameCollectionExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.drawing.design._14_1.vb)] [!code-cs[CategoryNameCollectionExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.drawing.design._14_1.cs)]
